args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Tires Manufactured Incorrectly/FMVSS 119

Great Dane Trailers (Great Dane) is recalling certain 2025-2026 Champion Dry Van trailers equipped with Bridgestone R123 Ecopia tires, size 295/75R22.5.  The tires may have been manufactured incorrectly with one of the three stabilizer ply belts applied in the wrong orientation.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) number 119, "New pneumatic tires - other than passenger cars."Incorrect belt orientation may cause the tires to fail and increase the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 16.0"
